spells.name: Air Step
spells.description: Tread unsteadily on air, with limitations.

spells.name: Companion Life Link
spells.description: Sense whenever your companion is wounded and call out to it in a time of need.

spells.name: Enemy Insight
spells.description: Grant others a bonus against your favored enemies.

spells.name: Shield Companion
spells.description: As shield other, but affecting your companion creature.

spells.name: Sickening Entanglement
spells.description: As entangle, but plants have sickening sap.
